project_abstract.cdata: The primary objective of the Emergency Education Reconstruction Project is to support Bosnia and Herzegovina's efforts to restore the delivery of primary education of acceptable quality during the 1996-97 school year. A second objective is to help build capacity for planning and implementation of education programs at the state, entity, canton, and municipality level. To achieve these objectives under the prevailing constraints, the project focuses on meeting immediate educational needs in primary schooling which can, for the most part, be put in place prior to the start of the next school year in September, 1996. The components of the project are the following: 1) primary school reconstruction; 2) books and educational materials; 3) project implementation and capacity building; and 4) project preparation and pilot implementation in the Republica Srpska. They include civil works, provision of furniture and equipment and technical assistance and training.
